column4: i cant login to gdm every time .i just see terminal so i enter "gdm" command in terminal. i give this error: ** (dgm-binary:1588): WARNING **: couldn't connect to system bus: Failed to connect to socket /var/run/dbus/system_bus_socket: No such file or directory
try.. startx .. or ... sudo service gdm start
ok , i test it  but why gdm cant boot every time ?
no idea.. sorry someone else will have to answer that one;
